titleInfo.title: Dance Recital at the National Home for Jewish Children in Denver

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#388 Residents of Nat. Home for Jewish Children'' and ''Jewish Sheltering Home 1910-1950s''. On back of photograph: ''Ready for the dance National Home for Jewish Children at Denver Jewish Sheltering Home 85 too live screen sq. line''.

mods.abstract: A group of unidentified young girls participate in a dance recital at the National Home for Jewish Children at Denver, which later became part of the National Jewish Hospital.
mods.note: Donated by the National Asthma Center.
